message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $11,500. I believe it holds significant value for you, and this price reflects its worth.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,750?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $10,750 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,500, but that's as high as I can go.
